name: Classic Margherita Pizza
cooking_method: 1. Preheat oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C). 2. Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet. 3. Spread tomato sauce over dough, leaving a small border. 4. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over sauce. 5. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until crust is golden brown. 6. Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
cooking_method: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and cook in a pan until no longer pink. 3. Add garlic and cook for another minute. 4. Add heavy cream and parmesan cheese to the pan and stir until the cheese has melted. 5. Toss pasta with the sauce and chicken. 6. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Parata
cooking_method: 1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 2. Cream butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl. 3. Beat in eggs one at a time. 4. Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl. 5. Gradually stir the flour mixture into the butter mixture. 6. Stir in chocolate chips. 7. Drop rounded spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet. 8. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned. 9. Cool on wire racks.

name: Beef Stroganoff
cooking_method: 1. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. 2. Cut beef into thin strips. 3. Cook beef and onion in a pan until browned. 4. Add beef broth and bring to a simmer. 5. Cook for 10-15 minutes or until the beef is cooked through. 6. Stir in sour cream and heat through. 7. Serve over cooked egg noodles.
